website_summaries.verdict: Equipped with a fourth-generation Intel Core i5 processor, the latest MacBook Air 13-inch shows decent performance gains. But it's the ultraportable's over 15 hours of battery life that blows away the competition.
pros: Over 15 hours of battery life, even with a Core i5 processor
Dual microphones for FaceTime and future Siri use
cons: Some performance cost for battery life

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful when buying these - or other items ...
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when buying these - or other items from OG Exclusives. We bought one less than six months ago, and it has stopped working. We have had it checked out locally, and are informed that the item had evidence of water internal water damage, which had been poorly repaired. OG refuse to accept this item back, saying six months is too long. For items of this value, they should offer at least a 12 month return to base warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Calafort

customer_reviews.title: you pay for quality and geet it with this mac book air
customer_reviews.text: first ever mac and i still have it now and working almost as good as it did when i first bought it. so much better than windows once you suss it out, battery is still good 3-4 years after buying it
customer_reviews.author: mark ezekiel

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and fast delivery. It's everything you'd expect from a Mac. I went with the 256gb SSD which is perfectly manageable. Loosing the DVD drive (which you would get on the Macbook Pro) worried me a little, but now the space and weight saver is a much better trade off. Great for transporting and, as a moderate user, I don't feel I loose anything from the Macbook experience by only having the Macbook Air. My wife also spends a lot of time editing movies pictures, and she loves it. We progressed from the old white Macbook, and we were so impressed with that, we knew we only wanted a Mac again. Once you go Mac...
customer_reviews.author: Loren Jones/Charly Burridge

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely cracking value, works brilliantly and I love it. I moved from PC to Mac and have never looked back thanks to this brilliant MacBook Air. Don't believe any of the negative reports on this machine, its just brilliant and amazing value compared to trying to get one off the high street. delivery time was a little long (they ship from Hong Kong) but no problems with it being sent from there, and it arrived in 100% perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias

customer_reviews.title: MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: What a great bargain. In fact I'm typing this review from the MacBook Air right now. It's light and stylee but also with plenty of space for my graphics, the back lighting's a great touch too and no more having to get recurrent anti spyware etc etc Apple really do their job well here. This laptop is just what I need both for business and also more personal stuff. It arrived really soon after I purchased it, really well packaged and in the original box. I'm so impressed with Techlogic Thanks
customer_reviews.author: T. A. VAZ

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery even though it looked like it was going to be just a lid by the customs note scared me for a bit. It is a US key board no problem though for £ signs just shift key and key 3 for the pound sign. I have had this computer a while all runs really well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Apple MacBook Air  laptop
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment ! Would highly recommend , purchased for my daughters Christmas present! She has wanted one for some time now, saved £150.00 buy buying online rather than local retailers!
customer_reviews.author: liz- Derry

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but does have some issues.
customer_reviews.text: Frew scratches on the front and back, took some time to provide tracking information, one corner of the trackpad is sticking out by a small bit (not the whole touchpad is "below the surface", one of the corners is lined up with the whole thing which shouldn't be the case. Other than that everything is alright.
customer_reviews.author: Szynszylin

customer_reviews.title: Great saving on a great product
customer_reviews.text: As long as you are not worried about no £ sign on the 3 key then I cant see any reason not to save over £250 on a Macbook Air by purchasing a US version. The Mac arrived the next day with UK plug adapter and enough charge to use straight away - Great Value.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Collins

customer_reviews.title: The laptop to buy
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're a professional image/video editor and really need massive graphical and processing power, this is the ultimate laptop. Light, extremely durable (dropped twice!), starts instantly and the battery life is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Gasman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased indeed with the Macbook Air
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased indeed with the Macbook Air, which is very light and portable, very easy to use and surprisingly powerful for tasks like photo editing. Great screen, boots up very quickly and has an excellent battery life. The larger 13in screen model is much better for work than the smaller one and I think a better buy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Wd

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: right now on this review i am writing with this macbook air. It did have an american keyboard but who cares.its delivery said it would come in 3 weeks but instead it came in 3 days. recommended
customer_reviews.author: jun

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my son, and he is delighted with it. It has all the functions he requires and it has fast response. l was very pleased with the delivery as well. It arrived within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie M

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Apple!! And the discount because the keyboard has the dollar sign instead of the pound one was very welcome! After years of MS Office, I am not going back!
customer_reviews.author: JoanaKew

customer_reviews.title: nimble and perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Fast, nimble and perfect for on the go. It's very lightweight, great battery life, often 9+ hrs on a single charge even after a year and incredible performance with the SSD.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: What a star. It is everything you would expect ...
customer_reviews.text: What a star. It is everything you would expect of Apple. Fast, big screen, charges quickly. Out performed iPad and iPhone when skyping.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is more than happy with thisApple MD760B/A 13.3 inch MacBook Air, he prefers Apple to Windows operations

customer_reviews.text: this is the probably the best laptop i have ever used, and its great to get away from windows. recommend to any one fantastic laptop.

customer_reviews.text: my daughter who uses it a lot professionally is thrilled by its low weight, finish, and performance, after years of slow and fussy Windows laptops. Could do with more memory but lives with it.

customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about ordering something from China, but it's a genuine Apple product with standard English settings. My wife has been using the laptop for over a month now without any problems and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: cheaper than elswhere at the time for my daughter, she loves this machine well made as most apple products are

customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product, fast delivery. My only slight disappointment is not with the retailer rather it's with the manufacturer. The interface is a bit 'plastic' compared to other Mac's, aside that it's another loveley product from Apple.

customer_reviews.title: Its an Apple so of course it is good. I Bought this for my son

customer_reviews.text: Was a windows user, now an ecstatic Mac user. I cannot stress how amazing this is. I couldn't believe how thin it was as well. Well worth the money and this is relatively cheap compared to other websites!! So just buy it!!

customer_reviews.text: As expected from apple a top quality well designed product which is a pleasure to own and use. highly recommended.

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and a fantastic price. Took a couple weeks to come but was worth the wait once it arrived x

customer_reviews.text: The best laptop I've ever had. I will never go back to a windows laptop. The quality, speed, design - everything is 10/10. Love it

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent laptop, delivery not too bad coming from Hong Kong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment. Recommend anyone to purchase this item. No problems with it.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and a very reasonable price. Arrived quickly. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: AntP

customer_reviews.title: brilliant!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, delivery time was accurate. Very simple to set up and use, love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte gray

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product
customer_reviews.text: I love this mac book air. It is so light and never gets hot underneath. it is fast to load too. It beats the hell out of windows which I would never go back to. It is an attractive laptop. I did buy a bag for it to go into, after all it is a lot of money and so needs protecting. I love the backlit keyboard, it is so useful, wish I had bought one years ago. The apple support number is also very efficient. It picked up the wireless signal immediately. Would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: supergran

customer_reviews.title: My lovely new toy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant new toy! My older laptop running Windows7 was my pride and joy but this exceeds my expectations!very easy to set up and use,lovely to handle,12 hours battery life is excellent and it arrived charged and ready to use,very good.I have yet to really see what it can do but as it imported all my info from my IPad automatically,I have high hopes!It arrived very well packed in 4 days since placing the order and was gently delivered to me by my local courier.If you have any doubts-don't worry it is just great!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lynda A. Byford

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Teenager
customer_reviews.text: This was an 18th birthday present for my daughter as my son also had one for his 18th. Was hoping they would have gone down in price in the 3 years since we bought his but no they had gone up!! But she loves it and it does everything she needs it for, Reading other reviews we expected a US keyboard but was in fact the UK version so needn't had worried. Would recommend have one happy teenager........enough said !!!
customer_reviews.author: WillerbyMum

customer_reviews.title: Like a Jewel
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous machine, very elegant. The battery life is remarkable: I don't turn it off, but just shut the lid. One important reservation is that the internal storage, being silicon rather than a spinning disc, is limited in size. This means that I have to maintain my photos and music on another machine (a Mac Mini) and the MacBook Air accesses them via a USB disc. The particular model delivered had a USA keyboard, but this causes no problems.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bland

customer_reviews.title: beat expectations
customer_reviews.text: 1.The US keyboard is so useful as I spend 50% of my time on the other side of the pond. 2.The bonus is a US adaptor and UK one both supplied by Apple, yes the real Apple. No more looking for adaptors. 3.$$$$$ sign for my business and easy to change to Sterling. 4.Apple support was free on phone and you should use it ...fantastic. 5.The keyboard lights up beautifully for working on flights or poor working conditions. A bargain price for me enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Ian Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value - great product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, slim and light. Very portable and the battery life is fantastic. As others have remarked the £ sign is not on the key but if you set it to UK English shift + 3 puts it in. I find the built in mouse annoying on Apple laptops because if I brush it by mistake (which is easily done as I don't touch type) it does all kinds of unexpected things so I prefer to use a separate keyboard and mouse, which also means I can have the laptop up higher to save my neck. All in all I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: U. Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Many good things.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars seems just right for this product, it's sleek and stylish. Like many I thought the American keyboard would be a problem but no it's absolutely fine. I only have one gripe- the charger worked for all of five minutes then broke which I was very unhappy about but amazon gave me a 5% refund which was enough to get a new charger (not apple) but the reviews were really good and it's charging my mac now. And the price...well that's not to be sniffed at at£789 with free next day delivery!!! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and superb price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it was at just £750 which was an absolute steal. Fantastic little laptop- fast and responsive. Personally, I prefer Windows but Mac OSX is simple and easy to operate- good for a novice user or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic computer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic computer recommend it to anyone. Super fast carnt wait for the new mavericks operating system to come out to interact with my smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nichol

customer_reviews.title: First class product
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped for and a bit more, not cheap but you get what you pay for, would like more USB connections.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Taub

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mac book
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my mac book air. Only ever used the windows system but it took no time at all to get used to. It has surpassed all expectations so if you are thinking of buying one do not hesitate you will be really chuffed!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Mac Book Air 256GB
customer_reviews.text: Initially unsure with longer dispatch time. However so glad we waited a little longer, as saved around £250 vs apples site. New product, boxed and ready with uk plug. No marks, scratches etc. Only slight concern was that it was labelled as radio parts for import into the uk. Not sure if that is quite right, however beyond this I was able to track it's long journey from Hong Kong, to Dubai, to Germany, then the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Herbert

customer_reviews.title: light as (MacBook) Air!
customer_reviews.text: It's a MacBook Air! need a say more?! I've been a dedicated PC boy all my life, but the Air has shaken me resolve! It's just amazing to hold, carry and use... and just admire from a distance! <3
customer_reviews.author: Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: For 95% of my IT jobs this is fine. I was thinking that I should get a MacBook Pro but at the moment, in my current role I don't need one. I'm a convert from Windows so I'm still learning how to do things but I like this laptop. The life of the batteries are great. I have a acer laptop and that can last about 2 hours without power. This MacBook can last all day, Im really impressed. I'm a happy Apple convert.
customer_reviews.author: d024912

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's 18th birthday, to say she was delighted was a total understatement. Everything you would expect from an Apple product, £ sign is not a problem as other reviewers have stated. Battery life exceptional. Delivery window was quite long but arrived at the front end of stated delivery timescale and was able to track exactly where product was, therefore, knew when delivery would be. Recommend this seller and would advise others not to be dubious about the massive saving in price compared to buying on the high street.
customer_reviews.author: Tan

customer_reviews.title: I decided to invest in a apple mac air and all I can say how great it is I strongly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have for sometime wanting to change my laptop but could not make up my mind what to get.I decided to invest in a apple mac air and all I can say how great it is I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: derek ralph woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great tech.
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to adjust to apple systems but help desk support was fantastic. A bit slow to download proh Grams such as printer driver.
customer_reviews.author: C L Richards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect,
customer_reviews.text: Light, portable, easy to use and so far meets my need for this laptop. Downside, I had to buy a smartdrive to install Office suite for mac, but hey I knew this before I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Beaton

customer_reviews.title: Few months ago I made the mistake of buying a ...
customer_reviews.text: Few months ago I made the mistake of buying a Toshiba satelliteC50-A-1JM . Ho dear! I have bought some naf in my time but the Tosh was naf of naf. Any way I have toyed with getting an Apple macbook for some time and deciced totake the plunge. All I can add is I wil never go back to windows cr##py systems ever again found what I was looking for at last.Thank you Apple.
customer_reviews.author: P J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: as I thought the price was too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried at first about ordering this, as I thought the price was too good to be true, but decided to put it on the credit card so I would be protected. It arrived after ten days (international shipping) and I love it. The US keyboard doesn't bother me at all really, it's a beautiful computer and works perfectly. I saved a lot of money ordering through this seller and am really glad I went for it. Will update if I have any problems, but all fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like most people have bought endless amounts of stuff over the internet with very little trouble. I was however a little bit nervous about buying something for the best part of £700 from a seller I'd never heard of. I had nothing to worry about!! The MacBook arrived about 10 days after I had ordered which was well within the stated arrival date. It was a gift for my sons 18th birthday and to say he was happy is an understatement. Very pleased with the item and the seller
customer_reviews.author: jason donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out
customer_reviews.text: Well, firstly it comes with the US keyboard and not the UK keyboard.... Easy to change but you will never see a £ sign on the keyboard! They also mail it out as a set of speakers worth £14 and therefore could easily get confiscated by customs or you have to pay the difference - will be reporting to Amazon as the customs thing really isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Birkinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd swapped from a PC years ago!
customer_reviews.text: After years of thinking of jumping form a PC to a Mac, i finally made the leap. What a machine! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Martin Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended, Buy through "fulfilled by amazon" just for safety
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was before 8am packaged great lots of protection added early 2014 version USA plug and keyboard, not a big issue comes with uk adaptor and 3 makes £ with shift comes pre installed with maverics easy update to Yosemite ultra fast operating system 1 month in not crashed yet 4gb ram easy enough for iPhoto and iMovie storage fast and vast Lit up keyboard is the GREATEST thing ever Works great with an iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Matt Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop ever!
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say? I am currently writing this review from my new Macbook Air and I love it! People may think this is too good to be true and although yes you are getting an American keyboard, who cares? At this price this needs to be snapped up fast! If you are a commuter or just starting uni or going into further education this is an ideal buy! I ordered it on the thursday and it arrived on the Monday, just a great laptop! What are you waiting for? Get it now!
customer_reviews.author: blair

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic my daughter loves it!! for Uni work
customer_reviews.text: Had bought a Mac Air same model from Birmingham Apple Shop. Exactly the same except the $sign. Instruction were given to change to English settings. Price wise very very good value for money. It takes a while to get use to it though after having Sony pc all our lives. But once shown it is so easy.... Would buy again for children.
customer_reviews.author: O Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Beyond expectations
customer_reviews.text: Well impressed! About 2 days after I placed the order, Apple declared an upgraded model (slightly) with 1.4GHz instead of 1.3. Imagine my delight when I opened the box and the model I received was the latest 1.4GHz! Ok it took 2 weeks to arrive, but well worth the wait. Beautiful, well engineered, efficient. It just works! Years of putting up with a Windows laptop, but I am so glad I made the change.
customer_reviews.author: Jonbro

customer_reviews.title: fast reliable easy to use
customer_reviews.text: has all my mobile computing needs covered. My wife loved it too. SSD is the way forward in computing. Worth the extra money over Windows laptops.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Love my new laptop, great price
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with my new laptop, its perfect and defiantly worth every penny. The key board is American which means it has a dollar sign instead of pounds, as the laptop is hundreds of pounds off the original price that hardly bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing! The price difference on here compared to buying from apple store when you get the exact same purchase...yes it is an american keyboard but honestly the differences are TINY! Delivery was so quick came within about two-three days after ordering everything was included and when you start up the Mac it tells you how to set the keyboard settings to British English. Would recommend this to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: mrh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied, great machine. Entered my apple id and everything was simple. still have a lot to st up but this all looks easy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I felt so happy when my Mac Book Air arrived. I am using it every day and it is very accreted the description
customer_reviews.author: Diego Richter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived super fast, within a couple of days. Brand new MacBook Air and actually I received the 2014 model! Super happy with purchase, you save so much money. It is the US keyboard but there is no difference really. Now need to get used to Mac after being a PC user for a decade!
customer_reviews.author: ukbliss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product my son is delighted with it. Lots you can do on it and not a problem that it is US version.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased !
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, good communication, quality product and it`s the latest model at a bargain price. It does seem to be an american market version because of the $ key, but as mentioned in previous reviews it matters not as shift hash produces your £ as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: sf lythgoe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: First time mac user. So far, very good. Was a little slow to arrive but within the guidelines given. Was a bit worried not buying from Apple but so easy to set up and no problems at also far. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kevin G Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my Mac Book Air
customer_reviews.text: My new Mac arrived within two days.. It had the American keyboard which I barely noticed. A few small differences. There was an English plug in the (sealed) box. It works like a dream.. Brilliant value - I saved about £200.. Love my Mac Book Air and would highly reccomend buying from Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Lenihan

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT FOR A GIFT.
customer_reviews.text: QPENED THE BOX. LIFTED THE LID. IT CAME ON .TRANSFERRED ALL FILES ETC FROM I PHONE AND MINI I PAD. IN LESS TIME THAN IT TOOK TOO OPEN THE PACKAGING. STRESS FEE, EVEN ARRIVED BEFORE LAST PREDICTED DATES.
customer_reviews.author: John H.Sowerby

customer_reviews.title: excellent value for money!
customer_reviews.text: This is not an expensive laptop at all when you consider the quality and functionality of the onboard software (and its connectivity to software from traditional PCs), its combination of elegant yet robust structure, its flexibility, and its performance in speed, graphics etc. To be liberated from the frustrations, wasted energy, and mind-numbing obstacles that are a standard feature of the PC world? - priceless!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sp Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: People that write bad reviews..... are actually stupid! yes it is has a US key board layout.... but it was £120 cheaper that everywhere else. oh and look.....I can do ££££££££. press alt & 3 = £. it does not have a cd drive... but it clearly do not say anywhere it does!!!
customer_reviews.author: MR J O HONEY

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, excellent seller, smartco outdone my expectations. Well happy with the product. This was a present for my daughter I think I need one now. It's a thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Francis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my mac book air, it's a great product which is the latest version and much cheaper than the standard price with as it is the American keyboard however the only real difference is there is no £ symbol.
customer_reviews.author: alex coles

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I am a Mac user since 2006 and wanted to keep the tradition. And the new Mac is great! d
customer_reviews.author: Emi

customer_reviews.title: I have coveted an Apple and.....
customer_reviews.text: I am not disappointed at all; I love it!!! It is so easy to use, built for idiots and I use it more than I ever did my last PC
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baker

customer_reviews.title: I Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it.... Just as decribed if not better.... NEW NEW would definetly recommend to someone thank you it saves me 250 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Better than Windows. A little difficult to ge used to especially for those who are used to windows but after getting the hang of it a amazing product definitely worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Transition from PC to Mac
customer_reviews.text: Goods delivered on time and as described. Takes time and patience to transfer from a PC to a MAC, but it's worth it.....
customer_reviews.author: Helen Shephard

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, arrived really quick and well wrapped .... All good.
customer_reviews.author: Reidy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine for a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: There's little I could add about how great the Macbook Air is, so I won't! Would just say I bought it through a marketplace seller. Yes, it's an American keyboard, but the only differences are the placement of the @ key (shift-2) and the £ sign (shift-3, not marked). And so what? For 12 hours plus battery life, lightning fast start-up from sleep and super-slim, portable format, for £680, it's an absolute steal.
customer_reviews.author: MX78

customer_reviews.title: Apple 13 inch MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly superb product. It is fully booted up and ready to go just 10 seconds after hitting the power key and shut down times are similarly very brief. Then there is the phenomenal battery life and the lightness of the unit despite its very robust aluminium case which gets barely warm at very worst. Add to all these positive features totally silent operation and the unburstable UNIX-based MacOS and in the MacBook Air you have a real winner!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. G. C. Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Easy choice if you need something that works well and has great battery life. The price is well ... high compared to windows laptops, but the difference can be easily felt just in a few days of use. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The computer is according to all my expectations and I don't have any problem with the delivery. For windows users, is hard the begging, but in some days everything is easy.

customer_reviews.text: arrived this morning totally brilliant well worth the money and £50 than the apple store still waiting if it does last the quoted 12hrs on one charge :)

customer_reviews.title: really reasonable seller
